<span class="grit">Hot Tip</span>
=================================

Deets[over 1 year ago](https://wesbos.com/tip/destructure-indexes-for-last-array-item "View Tip Details")

Tweet

ðŸ”¥ Here is a neat one! Since arrays are objects, we can destructure their indexes to easily grab the first and last items.
